issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: We have develop a Application and build in titanium 1.7.5 but now we are trying to build in 3.1.0, during build 3.1.0 we are geting error given bellow ib description section

comments.body: JIRA is a system meant to report bugs with Titanium. You need to ask implementation questions on the Q&A system. http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest

Titanium 1.7.5 is almost two and half years old and there have been numerous changes in the SDK and build system. We would suggest you to upgrade to the latest stack - SDK 3.2.2 + Studio 3.2.1 + CLI 3.2.1 and give it a try. Note that 3.1.0 does not support iOS7 so it is worth upgrading to the latest stack.
